entry.title: My present situation?
entry.content:
Trigger

How to introduce my present situation ?
What did I happen ?
When i wrote this article ,I immediately find my English skill is very terrible.Not only English skills,but also any other ability,such as Communication,Programming,Etc.
I need a big change in my life on everything.
I was born on July 24,1985 in Shanghai.so far,I am 30 years.
Recall past stories,I am a weak student. Poor performance is in every aspect.
Oh,shit!!I don’t really like myself.
Don’t be discouraged.Let’s us see what do I have.
Remember my place,Recognize myself.

Up to now ,What I have

  • I have paid down payment on a house ,It isn’t bad.Although the house is far away from the center of city.But it is very fantastic. It is desirable.
  • It seems that I have a good job,My salary is over 2400 dollars in one month. It neither be the best nor worst.I got satisfied.
  • I have a girl friend,Perhaps we will get married in the next months.
  • I have got a management degree from recognized university.
  • I have a healthy body.

    From here, I don’t be a successful guy. but my life looks not bad. 

    ---Mike Chen

What do I need to do ?

  • I have to find a new job for me .I hope my salary can be increased to 3700 dollars one per month.Another reason is my girl friend request me .
  • Practice English skills,using 51 talk,writing diary one per day
  • Losing weight,I wish I weight 85 kg.
  • To learn new IT skills,It can help me to find new job.

How to do

  1. Make shorten plan ,strongly recommend using wonderful list to control everything in my life.
  2. The most important is to keep hope and self-discipline.Please read Zengguo Fan’s writing to encourage myself.

Thanks everybody and god.
